attributes.additional_details: BECAUSE THERE'S PEOPLE OUT THERE WITH HEALTH CONDITIONS THAT CAN'T DRIVE, AND WITH THIS COST OF LIVING CRISIS. THEY CAN'T AFFORD TAXIS! OLD PEOPLE WHO GET LONELY AND CANT DRIVE, THEY GO ON BUSSES TO KEEP THEMSELVES COMPANY!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Make unlawful for any strike to reduce public transport services more than 50%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629042

Decisions about strikes by particular groups of bus drivers are a matter the relevant unions, and negotiations about ending these are a matter for the unions and relevant bus operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
